traits.name: Academy
traits.desc:
The Academy sponsors 3 items each game.

Copies of sponsored items grant bonus max Health and Damage Amp. Academy units holding sponsored items gain double the amount, plus an additional 5% Health and Damage Amp.

stats.3: 2% Health and Damage Amp, gain 1 sponsored item.
stats.4: 3% Health and Damage Amp, gain 1 sponsored item.
stats.5: 5% Health and Damage Amp, gain 1 sponsored item.

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.desc: Damage from Ambushers' Abilities can critically strike. They also gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

stats.5: 55% Crit, 25% Crit Mult; also gain 15% Durability

traits.name: Artillerist
traits.desc: Every 5 attacks, Artillerists launch a rocket that deals 125% Attack Damage around the target. They also gain Attack Damage.

stats.6: 70% AD, Launch a rocket every 3 attacks that deals double damage.

traits.name: Automata
traits.desc: Automata gain a crystal when they deal damage. At 20 crystals, they blast their current target, dealing magic damage + 25% of damage dealt since the previous blast and reset. They also gain Armor and Magic Resist.

stats.1:
The first time you would be eliminated, if Mel has cast 12 times during player combat this game, she saves you and you remain alive.

Afterwards, Mel permanently gains 10% Damage Amp.

stats.2: Maddie always targets Ambessa's target with her Ability and attacks. Every round where either gets at least 2 kill, gain a Maddie.

traits.name: Black Rose
traits.desc: Each Black Rose champion's star level increases Sion's power.

stats.3: Summon a chained Sion. He is freed after 5 casts from Black Rose units or when he drops below 65% health.
stats.4: Sion grows stronger and his enemies take more damage from Black Rose units.
stats.5: Sion unleashes dark magic and heals to full Health when freed.
stats.7: When Sion dies, he restores to life with power beyond death!

stats.2: Vander gains 30 permanent max Health each time Silco casts. Silco gains 6 permanent Ability Power each time Vander dies.

stats.1: Warwick devours enemies that drop below 12% Health, healing him for 450 and granting him 50 Mana.

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.desc: Your team gains 100 max Health. Bruisers gain more.

traits.name: Chem-Baron
traits.desc:
Gain Shimmer after each player combat. If your loss streak is at least 3, gain more.

At each stack of 100 Shimmer, the Black Market offers you contraband that only Chem-Barons can use. Chem-Barons gain max Health for each Black Market you pass on.

stats.3: Per Combat 15 or loss streak 35; 20 Health
stats.4: Per Combat 15 or loss streak 50; 60 Health
stats.5: Per Combat 20 or loss streak 70; 100 Health
stats.6: Per Combat 20 or loss streak 90; 150 Health

traits.name: Conqueror
traits.desc:
Conquerors' takedowns grant stacks of Conquest. After gaining enough Conquest, open War Chests full of loot!

Conquerors gain Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by 5% for each War Chest opened.

traits.name: Dominator
traits.desc:
Combat start: Dominators gain a Shield for 15 seconds.

When Dominators cast, they gain stacking Ability Power based on the Mana spent.

traits.name: Emissary
traits.desc: This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Emissaries.

stats.4:
Gain all bonuses. Emissaries gain 250 Health and 20% Damage Amp.

Ambessa: Allies gain 2 Armor and Magic Resist for each opponent defeated.

Garen: On Combat Start, Garen and allies to his left and right gain 20% of his max Health.

Nami: Allies' attacks grant 3 bonus Mana.

Tristana: Allies gain 6% Attack Speed per star level.

traits.name: Enforcer
traits.desc:
Combat Start: Enforcers gain Shield and Damage Amp. The highest Health enemy units become WANTED!

When a Wanted enemy dies, Enforcers gain 30% Attack Speed.

stats.10: ALL enemies; 100% Health, 150% DA, Combat Start: Confiscate all enemy items!

traits.name: Experiment
traits.desc:
Gain Laboratory hexes on your board.

Combat start: Experiments standing on Laboratory hexes gain the Experiment bonuses of all Experiments on Laboratory hexes, plus max Health.

traits.name: Family
traits.desc: Family members support each other, reducing their max Mana and gaining extra bonuses.

stats.5: 40% reduction, heist on topside! After combat, progress the heist, increased for each surviving family member!

traits.name: Firelight
traits.desc: Every 6 seconds, Firelights dash. While dashing, they attack with infinite range and heal a percentage of the damage taken since their last dash.

stats.4: 45% of damage taken. While dashing, gain a massive burst of Attack Speed.

traits.name: Form Swapper
traits.desc:
Innate: Form Swappers change their stats and ability based on if they're placed in the front 2 rows or back 2 rows.

Frontline Form Swappers gain Durability. Backline Form Swappers gain Damage Amp.

stats.2: When Heimerdinger casts, Ekko releases 3 afterimages, each dealing 33% damage. When Ekko casts, Heimerdinger fires 3 missiles, each dealing 105% damage.

stats.1:
When casting, Sevika rolls a random Jinx modification to her Ability and gains 80% Durability for 1.5 seconds.

Mods:
-Rocket: Launch 8 rockets that deal 100 physical damage each
-Shield: Gain 500 Shield for 4 seconds
-Coin: Gain 3 gold
-Triple: Enhance her rolled ability!
Every 3 rounds, open an armory to purchase permanent upgrades to your strongest Rumble's mech.

Viktor has a fixed attack speed of 0.55 Attacks per Second and converts ALL bonus Attack Damage, Attack Speed, and Mana into Ability Power.

Instead of Mana, Viktor gains 1 Chaos Energy every attack and casts when he has 8.

stats.2: When Ambessa casts, Caitlyn fires an empowered attack at the target, dealing 225% damage. Ambessa gains 30% of Caitlyn's Attack Damage.
Powder gains Dominator but no longer benefits from Family. When her monkey explodes, it creates 3 of Silco's monstrosities.

traits.name: Pit Fighter
traits.desc: Pit Fighters gain 15% Omnivamp and deal bonus true damage. Once per combat at 50% Health, they heal a percentage of their max Health over 2 seconds.

traits.name: Quickstriker
traits.desc: Quickstrikers move faster and gain Attack Speed, based on their target's missing Health.

stats.4: 40-100% AS. On target death, Quickstrikers dash to a new target and gain 200 shield for 3 seconds.

traits.name: Rebel
traits.desc:
Rebels gain 15% max Health.

After your team loses 25% of their Health, a smoke signal appears, granting Rebels 60% Attack Speed for 5 seconds and extra power for the rest of combat.

stats.7: 45% AD/AP, 15% Health, and Stun all enemies for 2 seconds
stats.10: The smoke signal triggers at Combat Start and every 12 seconds.

stats.2: When Vi casts, Ekko releases 3 afterimages towards her target each dealing 50% damage. When Ekko casts, Vi slams an earthquake towards his target dealing 150% damage.

traits.name: Scrap
traits.desc: Combat start: Components held by Scrap units temporarily turn into full items. Scrap units gain Shield for 24 seconds for each component held by your team, including those that make up a full item.

stats.6: All components, and full items become lucky! 45 Shield

traits.name: Sentinel
traits.desc: Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist. Sentinels gain triple.

traits.name: Adept
traits.desc: Adepts calm the flow of battle, reducing the Attack Speed of all enemies by 50% for a few seconds at the start of combat.

traits.name: Assassin
traits.desc:
Innate: Leap to the enemy backline when combat starts.

Assassins' Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.

stats.1: After each combat Ornn participates in, he makes progress forging an Artifact item. The higher his star-level, the faster he works.

traits.name: Brawler
traits.desc: Brawlers gain bonus Health and Attack Damage.

traits.name: Cultist
traits.desc: Once your team loses 50% of their Health, Galio is summoned, slamming into the largest cluster of enemies and Stunning them. Galio's strength increases based on total star level of all active Cultists.

stats.1: Samira seeks the thrill of battle, dashing after every other attack. After every dash, she gains a 10% max Health shield and her next attack fires 2 shots, gaining Style. At max Style, she casts.

traits.name: Divine
traits.desc: Upon attacking 6 times or dropping below 50% Health, Divine champions remove all crowd control and ascend, gaining Durability and dealing bonus true damage for 6 seconds.

traits.name: Dragonsoul
traits.desc:
The first few Dragonsoul allies to take damage in combat receive the Dragon's Blessing. While blessed, the unit gains bonus stats, and every 5th attack fires a Dragonsoul blast, dealing 40% of the target's max Health in magic damage.

On death, this blessing passes to the closest Dragonsoul ally without a blessing.

stats.3: 1 Blessing; 50% Attack Speed and Ability Power
stats.6: 3 Blessing; 90% Attack Speed and Ability Power
stats.9: 6 Blessing; 140% Attack Speed and Ability Power

traits.name: Duelist
traits.desc:
Innate: Duelists move faster.

Duelists' attacks grant Attack Speed, up to 10 stacks.

traits.name: Elderwood
traits.desc: Every 2 seconds all Elderwood champions grow, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

stats.3: 15 Armor and MR, 8 AD and AP
stats.6: 20 Armor and MR, 12 AD and AP
stats.9: 30 Armor and MR, 20 AD and AP

stats.1: Azir deploys with two Sand Guards who can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. They do not move or attack, and die when Azir does.

traits.name: Enlightened
traits.desc: Enlightened champions generate more Mana.

traits.name: Executioner
traits.desc: Executioners' attacks and Abilities always critically hit targets beneath a certain Health threshold.

traits.name: Exile
traits.desc: If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain:

stats.1: A shield equal to 50% of their max Health

stats.3: Empower the Abilities of Fabled champions with an additional effect.
Winning combat against a player will give bonus orbs. The longer you've gone without an orb, the bigger the payout!
stats.6: Wins give an extra bonus orb with rare loot.
stats.10: Legends say one day the Money Tree will rise up to fight.

traits.name: Keeper
traits.desc: At the start of combat, Keepers grant themselves and all adjacent allies a Shield for a duration. This Shield is 50% stronger on Keepers.

traits.name: Mage
traits.desc: Mages cast their Abilities twice and have modified total Ability Power.

stats.9: 190% Ability Power, Mages cast MUCH more frequently

traits.name: Mystic
traits.desc: Your team gains Magic Resist.

traits.name: Ninja
traits.desc:
Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power.

This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

stats.1: Ninja gains 50% Attack Damage and 50 Ability Power
stats.4: All Ninjas gain 140% Attack Damage and 140 Ability Power

traits.name: Sharpshooter
traits.desc: Sharpshooters' attacks and Abilities ricochet to nearby enemies, dealing reduced damage.

traits.name: Slayer
traits.desc: Slayers gain Omnivamp that gets stronger as their own Health decreases, and gain Damage Amp that scales up based on their target's missing Health.

stats.3: 15% to 30% Omnivamp and 10% to 30% Damage Amp
stats.6: 30% to 60% Omnivamp and 20% to 40% Damage Amp
stats.9: 45% to 80% Omnivamp and 30% to 50% Damage Amp

traits.name: Spirit
traits.desc: The first time each Spirit casts, all allies gain Attack Speed.

traits.name: Syphoner
traits.desc: Your team gains Omnivamp.

stats.2: 10% Omnivamp for Allies; 40% Omnivamp for Syphoners
stats.4: 25% Omnivamp for Allies; 100% Omnivamp for Syphoners
stats.6: 50% Omnivamp for Allies; 125% Omnivamp for Syphoners

stats.1: When Sett first drops below 40% Health, he leaves combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores 15% of his maximum Health and gives him 40% Attack and Move Speed. If he reaches full Health he returns to combat Pumped Up: all of his attacks and spells deal true damage. If all of his allies die, he will immediately return to combat.

traits.name: Vanguard
traits.desc: Vanguards gain bonus Armor and Magic Resist.

traits.name: Warlord
traits.desc: Warlords have bonus Health and Ability Power. Each victorious player combat increases the bonus by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

stats.11: 1500 HP and 150% AP; Combat Start: The Warlord's army joins the fight.

stats.2: When Jinx scores a takedown, Vi gains 40% bonus Attack Damage for 7 seconds. When Vi scores a takedown, Jinx gains 75% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

traits.name: Sniper
traits.desc: Snipers deal more damage to targets farther away.

stats.6: Damage Amp 75%, 20% damage per hex and +5 Attack Range

traits.name: Sorcerer
traits.desc: Your team gains 10 Ability Power. Sorcerers gain more.

stats.6: 90 AP, Abilities reduce their target's damage by 20% for 3 seconds

stats.2: Jinx and Sevika gain 10% Attack Damage and 150 Health. Whenever one casts, they grant the other 15 mana. Sevika's arm is luckier.

traits.name: Visionary
traits.desc: Whenever Visionaries gain Mana, they gain more.

stats.6: 75% Mana, Abilities heal an ally for 16% of damage dealt

traits.name: Watcher
traits.desc: Watchers gain Durability, increased while above 50% Health.
